docs.title: Getting Started

docs.summary: Install UIK packages for tokens, primitives, patterns, and shell.

docs.summary: Register custom elements, wire events, and load components safely in any host.

docs.summary: Load base tokens, include theme layers, and override CSS variables in the host app.

docs.title: Theme + Density
docs.summary: Control light/dark themes and density modes via data attributes.

docs.title: Tokens Reference
docs.summary: UIK tokens are the single source of truth for all visual values and component hooks.

docs.title: Baseline Support Matrix
docs.summary: Baseline classification of platform features used by UIK.

docs.title: Components
docs.summary: Browse UIK primitives, patterns, and shell components in one place.

docs.title: Primitives Reference
docs.summary: Shadow DOM building blocks that read tokens and expose explicit contracts.

docs.title: Shell Patterns
docs.summary: Light DOM layout primitives that compose the UI into a consistent application shell.

docs.title: Patterns
docs.summary: Curated recipes built from primitives, patterns, and tokens.

docs.title: Empty State
docs.summary: Guide first actions when there is no content yet.

docs.title: Page Hero
docs.summary: Introduce a page with context, actions, and controls.

docs.title: Section Card
docs.summary: Group related settings with aligned actions.

docs.title: Command Palette
docs.summary: Offer keyboard-first navigation with a command palette.

docs.title: Overlays and Feedback
docs.summary: Use dialogs, popovers, tooltips, and progress indicators.

docs.title: Menus and Menubars
docs.summary: Expose primary actions with menus and menubars.

docs.title: Shell Patterns
docs.summary: Manage shell layout state and status bar controls.

docs.title: Example Blocks
docs.summary: Use uik-example to pair previews with copyable code.

docs.title: Apply Preview
docs.summary: Preview JSON changes before applying updates.

docs.summary: Render structured JSON with keyboard navigation, copy actions, and token-driven styling.

docs.title: Diff Preview

docs.title: Examples
docs.summary: Production-ready UI examples with preview + code for common flows.
